SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbleToGetPoints
This interface defines which objects can get the player points.
Board
This class represents the board of the game as a matrix of items.
BoardView
This class is used to print the board in the cli
Bookshelf
This method represents a bookshelf, where the player can collect items.
BookshelfUtilities
This class contains some methods to create a bookshelf.
BookshelfView
This class is used to print the bookshelf in the cli
Client
This class represents the client.
ClientCommunicationInterface
This class defines the methods that a client must implement independently of the communication protocol used.
ClientRmi
This class is the RMI implementation of the client.
ClientTcp
This class is the TCP implementation of the client.
CliUtilities
This class contains methods and constants used in the CLI, such as methods to ask questions and validate the answers and methods to print the board and the bookshelves.
Color
The color of an item.
CommonGoal
A common goal card, which has a layout to be matched by the players' bookshelves and a stack of scores to be assigned to the players.
CommonGoalView
This class is used to print the common goal in the cli
Coordinates
This class is used to represent the coordinates of the items in the board
Corners
The common goal layout with four tiles of the same type in the four corners of the bookshelf.
Diagonal
The common goal layout with five cards of the same type in a diagonal.
EndGameGuiController
This class is the controller for the end game gui.
FullLine
The common goal layout with a row or a column with every cell filled.
GameCliView
This class handles the CLI view of the game.
GameGuiController
This class is the controller for the main game scene.
GameModel
 
GameView
This is the interface used for the view (cli or gui)
Group
This class includes two different common goals: 1. the common goal with six groups of at least two equal items 2. the common goal with four groups of at least four equal items
GuiView
This class is the GUI view, it extends Application and implements GameView.
Item
An item made of a color and a number identifying its drawing.
ItemsPerColor
This is the common goal layout with eight items of the same color.
ItemView
This class is used to print the items in the cli.
Layout
The disposition of the items in a common goal whose position has to be matched in the bookshelf.
LoginGuiController
This is the controller for the login gui.
Message
This class represents a message.
MyShelfie
This is the entry point of the client.
PersonalGoal
This class represents a personal goal card, which contains the disposition of the items to be matched by the player in the bookshelf in order to increase its score.
PersonalGoalView
This class is used to print the personal goal card in the cli.
Player
This class represents a player of the game and contains all their information.
PlayerSelectionGuiController
This class is the controller for the player selection Gui.
RefusedGuiController
This class is the controller for the refused gui, in case there are too many players who want to play.
Room
A room is a collection of players that are playing together.
Server
Complete server class, which starts both RMI and socket servers.
ServerCommunicationInterface
Here go the methods that the client can call on the server.
ServerController
 
ServerInterface
Defines the methods that a server must implement independently of the communication protocol used.
ServerRmi
 
ServerTcp
 
SettingLoader
This class provides methods to load the settings of the game from the JSON files and the properties file.
SocketClientHandler
 
Square
The common goal layout with a square of cells of the same type.
Stair
The common goal layout with columns of increasing or decreasing height.
WaitingRoomController
This class is the controller for the waiting room scene, since it's a static scene it doesn't have any methods.
XShape
The common goal layout with tiles of the same type forming an X shape.
